extracted_text: Maximum height is 60 feet in the district. However, the maximum height in the district abutting property used or zoned for single family residential is 40 feet, except the height may exceed 40 feet if there is an increase in side and rear yards of one foot for every foot of building height over 40 feet up to the 60 feet maximum.
llm_outputs.rationale: The section explicitly states the maximum height for the Neighborhood Services (NS) district, including different requirements when abutting single family residential property.
